thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com | 3 de 391
thread.title: Rowan Ferguson

author: Rowan Ferguson
title: Rowan Ferguson
text: Spent Â£64 on flowers for delivery from UK to NZ, for delivery on 14 Dec for mother's Xmas. Have only spoken to her now (Feb), to find out if she liked her flowers - she never received them. On contacting FloraQueen their response was they won't accept any responsibility because their policy is I would have had to report non-delivery no more than 2 days after delivery date. These were an Xmas surprise, so I wasn't going to ask my mother before Xmas if she received them. I assumed she had - as she has every year when I've ordered through a reputable international florist. Once bitten - never again!
